Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near 74th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted WB: 74th, Halsted, 76th, Racine; EB: 74th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, and 74th, due to, street blockage, near 74th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 74th/Halsted, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via: 74th, Halsted, 76th, Racine.

Eastbound buses will operate via: .74th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, and 74th.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Southbound buses are not affected.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
